quote: When you get to the top of the mountain, keep climbing.
What is the sound of one hand clapping?
No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
Without speaking, without silence — tell me the truth.
Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
Show me your original face before you were born.
A wild goose does not intend to cast its reflection; the water has no mind to receive it.
Sitting quietly, doing nothing, spring comes and the grass grows by itself.
Don’t seek the truth. Just drop your opinions.
The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
